polar adjective
(OF ELECTRICITY)
relating to either of the two ends of a magnet or two parts of a battery (= device that produces electricity) which have opposite charges: fig. The play’s main characters are polar opposites (= They are completely opposite).
chemistry Polar also describes a substance whose molecules have opposite positive and negative poles
